projects.title: AI Commerce Platform
projects.description: A real e-commerce and repair-booking platform replacing manual workflows with digital precision. Features AI instant quotes and real-time tracking.
projects.details:
This is a real e-commerce and repair-booking platform built for a local mobile repair shop, designed to replace WhatsApp messages, phone calls, and guesswork with a proper digital workflow.

The system includes an AI-powered Instant Quote engine that:
• Takes the device model
• Understands the type of damage
• Uses live spare-part pricing
• Returns a realistic repair estimate in seconds

Alongside that, the platform provides:
• 24/7 repair slot booking
• An online store for accessories
• Real-time order and inventory tracking
• A business dashboard to manage jobs and customers

This isn’t a demo store — it’s software built to increase trust, reduce friction, and convert visitors into paying customers.

projects.title: Solvra — Smart Attendance System
projects.description: A fraud-resistant attendance platform using face recognition, geofencing, and QR codes to eliminate proxy attendance.
projects.details:
A fraud-resistant attendance platform built to eliminate proxy and location-based cheating in educational institutions.

Solvra verifies attendance using three independent signals — student identity (face recognition), physical presence (GPS geofencing), and session-bound QR codes — ensuring only the right student in the right classroom can mark attendance.

The system includes:
• Role-based dashboards for Admin, Faculty, and Students
• Real-time attendance tracking
• Secure JWT-based authentication
• Live classroom location validation

Built as a full-stack, security-first system designed to work under real classroom conditions.

projects.title: AI-Powered Multilingual Speech Translation Platform
projects.description: Built a web app that converts speech into text and regional Indian languages (English, Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, Kannada).
projects.details:
Built a web app that converts speech into text and regional Indian languages (English, Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, Kannada).

Supports video uploads and YouTube links to generate translated transcripts from any video.

Used AssemblyAI for accurate speech recognition.

Used Google Language APIs to create clear, grammatically correct translations.

Built the UI with Streamlit for fast and simple user interaction.

Automatically processes:
Video → Audio → Text → Translation → Final Transcript

Helps make English content accessible to regional language users across India.
